name: Idle Jumping
description:
This game was made because I was bored.

The background asset is stolen from polymars's flappuccino, everything else was made by me

This game doesn't save, and short to play through, you could play it forever, but after a while you would get bored.

UPDATE 1.2:

Added a new shop upgrade, auto jump which will make you able to automatically jump every x seconds.

Other small improvements

UPDATE 1.1:

Added a new rebirth shop upgrade, time speed which increases the game's speed (useful for late game)

Other small improvements
